name: Village Inc.
description:
A small-world themed architect-em-up game made for the 34th GM48 Game Jam

You're the new village architect. Place buildings, fulfil commissions and make the small world of villages beautiful!

You're contracted to create small worlds for local residents across the land! But each village has its own ideas about what it should look like - place the allotted buildings and meet the specifications for each village in this cutesy architect-em-up game!

Unlock and work through sixteen villages and unlock the bonus mode at the end, if you can make it through (some of those village planners are awfully particular!)

This game was made in 48 hours for the 34th GM48 Game Jam

Check out the original Version 1.0 on GM48 here: https://gm48.net/game/1556/village-inc
